title: [1.12.2-1.5.2][SSP/SMP][授权搬运]Project Red 红石计划&红石工程
txt_content:
本帖最后由 23235599 于 2018-5-26 13:46 编辑 


写在前面

Project Red即红石计划，是一个与红石相关的科技mod.它的前身名叫RedPower2(即红石力量2，作者Eloraam)，这个mod已经高度还原此mod.目前由MrTJP和Chickenbones共同维护、更新.我以前喜欢rp，于是向作者要来了搬运授权，在mcbbs上搬运.
Forge Relocation是另一个mod，它是配合ProjectRed运行的mod，但它可以单独使用.它增加了移动方块的另一种方法(很像红石运动机构MOD)此贴暂不作介绍.
关于搬运授权





捕获.PNG (48.08 KB, 下载次数: 517)

下载附件

2015-8-15 18:33 上传





描述还在为原版渣渣红石粉只能传输红石信号只有15格而烦恼吗？还在为原版红石系统体积超大而不满足吗？这个mod增加了能传输上千格的红色合金线缆，和可以大大简化原版的红石电路逻辑门，甚至在一格中能放置几个逻辑门!还有独特的传输系统等等。。内容丰富，值得一玩.
相关教程
wiki地址：http://projectredwiki.com/wiki/Main_Page这样看，既然是redpower的重制版，那么应该rp的教程也适用：教程 不要看他的合成表，用nei查就行了
更新日志v4.7.0pre8- ADDED: Fuel Efficiency enchantment for jetpacks- ADDED: Stock Keeper infinite stock option- ADDED: Stock Keeper matching options- FIX: Filtered Importer not saving filter- FIX: Project Bench not pulling evenly from crafting slots- FIX: Routed pipes only seeing top stack for barrels and deep storage units- FIX: Items being routed to full inventories- FIX: IC Gate crash when using 2D wire renderer- FIX: IC NOT gates not cycling dead sides correctly- CHANGE: Rebalanced motor power usage- CHANGE: Rebalanced solar panel power generationv4.7.0pre7- ADDED: Project Bench- ADDED: Auto Crafting Bench- FIX: Filtered Importer merging unstackable items- FIX: Lamps blocking mob spawning even when off- FIX: Crafting tree reporting incorrent missing items- FIX: Chip settings panels opening in inconvienient places- CHANGE: Microblocks of inverted lamps will light up- CHANGE: Crafting chip now extracts up to a stack- CHANGE: Motors no longer continuously move blocksv4.7.0pre6- ADDED: Jetpack particles and models- ADDED: Crafting Extension chip- REMOVED: Routing chip upgrade system- REMOVED: Routed Crafting pipe- REMOVED: Routed Extension pipe- FIX: Furnace recipe crash- FIX: Inteface pipe keeping logic after removing chip- FIX: Filtered importer destroying items- FIX: Redstone not connecting to machines properly- FIX: Analog IC IOs showing incorrect frequency in their guis- FIX: Teleposer server crash- CHANGE: Moved crafting logic from crafting pipe to chip- CHANGE: Crafting chip can now be installed in any Interface pipe- CHANGE: New routing fxv4.7.0pre5- ADDED: Cell gate IC parts- ADDED: Creative mode IC Chip with instant and free prints- ADDED: IC Blueprint reset recipe- ADDED: IC Blueprint copy recipe- FIX: IC Gates not updating neighbors properly- FIX: IC Gates not recognizing white signal changes- FIX: Crash when resource packs change lily textures- FIX: Container item duplication exploit- FIX: Rebalanced frame motor electricity use- FIX: Thermal expansion auto-adding incorrect recipes for electrotine ingots and dusts- FIX: Solar panels no longer working after 1 day cycle- FIX: IC Printer not recognizing lever- FIX: IC Printer crashing because some mod added an invalid recipe- FIX: IC Printer container shift clicking- FIX: Dependency auto-downloader trying to use outdated links- CHANGE: Rewrote Firewall pipe gui- CHANGE: Rewrote Request pipe gui- CHANGE: IC Printer can now pull items from adjacent inventoriesv4.7.0pre4- FIX: Server crash when using some IC gates- CHANGE: Reworked Routing Chip guisv4.7.0pre3- ADDED: Teleposer- 下载地址：curseforge下载页面其中MrTJPcore和Project Red - Base必须安装其他的可根据实际选择安装或者全安装也行~（推荐）Forge Relocation和MrTJPcore请扔进mods/1.7.10（1.12.2）文件夹
